question: For this question, refer to the TerramEarth case study. You are migrating a Linux-based application from your private data center to Google Cloud. The TerramEarth security team sent you several recent Linux vulnerabilities published by Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE). You need assistance in understanding how these vulnerabilities could impact your migration. What should you do? (Choose two.)

options.text: Open a support case regarding the CVE and chat with the support engineer.
Read the CVEs from the Google Cloud Status Dashboard to understand the impact.
Read the CVEs from the Google Cloud Platform Security Bulletins to understand the impact.
Post a question regarding the CVE in Stack Overflow to get an explanation.
Post a question regarding the CVE in a Google Cloud discussion group to get an explanation.
